item.title: Storage_1
item.description: Storage Manually create storage account from Azure Web Console, then confirm it using the following commands 1 2 3 $ SubID=$(az account show --query id --output tsv) $ az group list --subscription $SubID --query [].name $ az storage account list --subscription $SubID --query [].name Give myself permission to create container and upload blob 1 2 3 4 $ az ad signed-in-user show --query id -o tsv | az role assignment create \ --role "Storage Blob Data Contributor" \ --assignee @- \ --scope "/subscriptions/$SubID/resourceGroups/trg" Let’s assume the storage account name is tsc123tsc, create container as tsc.
